JobFullDesc:
Elastic is a search company built on a free and open heritage. Anyone can use Elastic products and solutions to get started quickly and frictionlessly. Elastic offers three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security, built on one technology stack that can be deployed anywhere. From finding documents to monitoring infrastructure to hunting for threats, Elastic makes data usable in real time and at scale. Thousands of organizations worldwide, including Cisco, eBay, Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, The Mayo Clinic, NASA, The New York Times, Wikipedia, and Verizon, use Elastic to power mission-critical systems. Founded in 2012, Elastic is a distributed company with Elasticians around the globe and is publicly traded on the NYSE under the symbol ESTC. Learn more at elastic.co.

Elastic is growing fast and we're looking for a highly motivated and dedicated Recruiter to join our global Talent Acquisition Team.
You’ll focus on partnering with our dynamic Field Operations Team to hire revenue-generating and customer-facing positions across the Americas, thinking creatively and attracting top talent. Long-term, you’ll be driving and supporting key diversity initiatives as you help grow Elastic.
Our ideal candidate has recruited for multiple types of positions and profiles, primarily related to Field Operations (Technical Sales, Customer Success, Professional Services, Pre-sales Engineers). The ability to occasionally flex and take on other focus areas may occur depending on the business's needs; you are a team player and ready to roll-up your sleeves and jump in when needed.

What You Will Be Doing:

Engaging talent and leading the hiring process from end-to-end with an extraordinary candidate experiencePartnering strategically with hiring managers to build diverse teams and identify specific skillset deficits within their departmentActively participating and working with the Global Recruiting Team to develop, implement, and execute recruiting strategiesBuilding relationships with Field Operations team with leaders and interviewers at various levels internallyServing as an advisor and partner to provide healthy and meaningful pipelines of stellar candidatesGrowing Elastic’s brand before, during, and after recruitment; you will help us build our talent brand in addition to our talent pipelineWorking hand-in-hand with cross-functional teams, such as Hiring Managers, HRBPs, Compensation and FP&A teams 

What You Bring Along:

5+ years of recruiting experience for Technical Sales and SaaS Sales, bonus points if you have agency experience and/or have recruited for a variety of departmentsPassion for Diversity, Inclusion, Equity, and Belonging and you know that your role in Recruitment is imperative to building great teamsDemonstrable experience recruiting for a very fast-paced, high-growth SaaS company where you’ve had to juggle different prioritiesHigh organizational skills and attention-to-detail, and the ability to effortlessly handle multiple reqs without dropping the ballStrong business acumen with the ability to listen, ask smart questions, and think three steps ahead, and negotiate like a proAbility to effectively articulate the Elastic value proposition and story to candidatesExperience collaborating with and influencing senior hiring managers and executives throughout the recruiting cycleWorking knowledge of ATS tools (Greenhouse and Workday are a bonus!)

Additional Information - We Take Care of Our People

As a distributed company, diversity drives our identity.  Whether you’re looking to launch a new career or grow an existing one, Elastic is the type of company where you can balance great work with great life. Your age is only a number. It doesn’t matter if you’re just out of college or your children are; we need you for what you can do.
We strive to have parity of benefits across regions and while regulations differ from place to place, we believe taking care of our people is the right thing to do.
